cause.description:
The National Trust for Historic Preservation provides leadership, education, advocacy, and resources to save America's diverse historic places and revitalize our communities. Learn more at our website: http://www.preservationnation.org.
Become a fan of the National Trust for Historic Preservation: http://www.facebook.com/pages/National-Trust-for-Historic-Preservation/26937096101.
Download our application and take action on our campaigns: http://apps.facebook.com/preservationnation/.
Buy or sell items to support the National Trust for Historic Preservation: http://apps.facebook.com/marketplace/charity/530210807
1. Saving the places where great moments from history – and the important moments of our everyday lives – took place.
2. Sparking economic development and revitalizing neighborhoods and communities.
3. Promoting environmental sustainability by using existing resources.
4. Encouraging new development to complement historic buildings and landscapes.
5. Preserving open space, rural heritage, ancient sites and cultural landscapes.
cause.mission: The National Trust for Historic Preservation helps people protect, enhance and enjoy the places that matter to them.
cause.name: National Trust for Historic Preservation in the US
